price: 36. Miyaan laga abaal marin gaalada waxay (xume) falayeen?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
